title: Mortar

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Fire a mortar shell at a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You have 3 mortar shells.

> You may not shoot people 1-2 spots away from you on the player list (Dead players do not count as players near you on the player list).

> If 7 or less players are alive, your restriction is dropped. Revivals will not reinstate this restriction.

> If you kill a town member, you will lose all your shells.

desc:
Post 904
*"Why did you just shoot a mortar shell at that person?"*
*"They might be evil!"*
*"They were the confirmed Old Retri."*
*"Oops."*
*"Look, it's the last evil faction member, shoot them with your mortar!"*
*"Nah, I think I'm done shooting people, I feel too bad after killing the Old Retri."*
*"..."*
